page.title: 15Services in Langtoft 1
page.content: Although it is only a small village Langtoft has numerous services.It is serviced by a number of mobile outlets. There are mobile butchers, fishmongers,bakers, and grocers.There are also deliveries of milk and newspapers. These are undertaken by Philip and Tricia Whitley. There is also an{Undertaker}in the village.He is Mr. Ken Harland who lives on Back Street and is also a joiner and a farmer with 74 acres. Mr.Alfred Bekker caries out the business of{manufacturing and fitting {special hand controls}to vehicles{for the{Disabled.}His premises have been adapted to accommodate his customers who come from all over the country. In the summer Mr. Whitley runs a{Snack {Bar}from an adapted caravan in the old chalk quarry on Tire Ewe Hill.
